Question: This person became an international pop culture icon immediately after launching her recording career.
Hints: This person's aunt Sandra Bridges Covington, with whom she had been very close, died of ovarian cancer in January.
On April 17, 2013, this person announced she recorded the song "Ooh La La" for the soundtrack of The Smurfs 2.
This person premiered songs from her upcoming second album during the show.
